item.title: Honorary Members
item.description: Count Adam Zamoyski Historian, author of books on Polish history George Dobry CBE, QC A distinguished English Judge Mr Grzegorz Król Managing Director, Nestle UK HE Mr Jan Krzysztof Bielecki Former Prime Minister of Poland, President of Pekao SA, Warsaw, Poland Mr Jean Lemierre Former President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development Mr Kazimierz Marcinkiewicz Former Prime Minister of Poland; Director for Poland/Albania/Bulgaria, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
